title: Tails
post_body: Most worthwhile things in life have long tails. Compound interest, relationships, and opportunities all have long tails. This essentially means they progress painfully slowly at their outset, and over long stretches of time they mature and yield massive outsized returns.

title: Phony Data Generator
post_body: It would be pretty cool if there was a tool that populated phony data using a content topic, a writer voice, and their mood.

title: Code is Challenging
post_body: Sometimes code can be challenging. It's ultimately work and that's why they have to pay people to do it, otherwise it'd purely be there for recreation.
